attributes.action: Introduce ILR to International students who studied and lived for 5yrs in the UK
attributes.additional_details:
Contribution in the UK economy.
References
BBC NEWS. 2018. Overseas students 'add £20bn' to UK economy. [ONLINE] Available at:https://www.google.co.uk/amp/s/www.bbc.co.uk/news/amp/education-42637971. [Accessed 1 April 2018].
attributes.background: International students add 20bn to UK economy but don’t have lots of opportunities in the UK. Most of them have 4 months to find a job after completion of thier studies otherwise you’re kicked out of the country. Something has to be done, International students deserve more opportunities in the UK.
